price: 8. Then We destroyed men stronger (in power) than these - and the example of the ancients has passed away (before them).
arabic: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: fa-ahlaknā ashadda min'hum baṭshan wamaḍā mathalu al-awalīna
